name: nodegoogledrivelocalsync
description: A simple node pkg that syncs files on your local machine with your google drive. Just create a config file that has the cloud parent(s) as well as a cred.json file. Require the nodesync pkg in your project and provide an array of folders to watch. That's it. Contribute to make it more interesting. (><) (><)
author: Shavon Golbourne
